text: Eto nakazaniye suzhdeno neveruyushchim, a dlya tekh, kotoryye uverovali i byli bogobyaznennymi, - rayskiye sady, gde vnizu tekut reki i gde oni vechno prebyvat' budut. To, chto Allakh ugotovil pravednikam, luchshe togo, chto imeyut nevernyye v blizhayshey zhizni - vremennuyu suyetu i blagopoluchiye
